title: Begley and MacMahon
description:
Zach and Ian Begley of SNY talk Knicks in the aftermath of missing out on Donovan Mitchell, then ESPN's Tim MacMahon joins to talk more Mitchell/Jazz and preview the Dallas Mavericks. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
